member.name: T:CMS.AzureCloudServices.AzureCloudServicesModule
member.summary: Ensures consistency and validity of Instances running within Azure Cloud Service environment.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureCloudServices.AzureCloudServicesModule.GetApplicationSettings(System.String)
member.summary: Reads settings from service configuration file.

member.name: T:CMS.AzureCloudServices.RoleEnvironmentHandlers
member.summary: Handlers for events used for application validity.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureCloudServices.RoleEnvironmentHandlers.ApplicationInit
member.remarks: This method is called automatically and should not be used in custom code.

member.name: M:CMS.AzureCloudServices.RoleEnvironmentHandlers.RestartInstanceOnConfigurationChange(System.Object,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.ServiceRuntime.RoleEnvironmentChangingEventArgs)
member.summary: Role environment changing event. Fired before change is applied.
